page.title: 17FLYING SQUADRON BRIZE NORTON
page.content: The main job of{R.A.F. Brize Norton} is to be able to move troops and equipment anywhere in the world as quickly as possible. There are 3 squadrons presently stationed here who carry passengers and freight to bases overseas.{Number 10 Squadron}is equipped with 13{VC_10's}and is the largest Flying Squadron in the R.A.F. They make regular flights to Washington ,Belize ,Sardinia ,Cyprus and Ascension Island.Other flights are made to support the Army in Europe,U.S.A.,Canada & Australia. Emergency{aeromedical flights}will travel anywhere as necessary.Also{10 {Squadron}flies members of the{Royal {Family}and senior members of the{ {Government}on long trips worldwide.{ {101 Squadron}is equipped with{VC_10K2} tankers air to air refuelling as are the{Tristars}of{216 Squadron}.
